 A grandmother from St. Petersburg, Florida is fighting the Jehovah's Witnesses after her teenage grandson died due to the "revealed" religion's superstition that forbides members from receiving blood transfusions .
 
 I spoke to the grandmother, Olga Lindberg, yesterday. She told me that members of the Jehovah's Witnesses stayed with her grandson in his hospital room around the clock reciting Bible verses to encourage him not to take the blood transfusions. They did this until he died. Understandably, she is very upset with her daughter who is a JW, as well as with the entire organization of Jehovah's Witnesses.
 
 This very sad situation and unnecessary death of a teenager is important for Deists. Our actions of bringing this tragedy to the attention of people we speak to will help to make sure that Dennis did NOT die in vain! As Olga said, God gave us brains to discover and create medicines and medical procedures that allow us to heal and care for the sick and injured. God wants us to use those brains for the good of all of humanity. If God wanted us to follow the teachings of the Bible, He/She wouldn't have given us brains and reason!
 
 Please let everyone you talk to know about this preventable tragedy. And know that by spreading Deism you are lessening the deadly impact of the "revealed" religions!
